arStrings.szText: {c_important}Concussive Stomp{/c} grants a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} equal to {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_13]){/c} per enemy hit for {c_number}{buffduration:BARRIER}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_13} * {SF_14} * 100|%|]{/c}.
When enemies recover from {c_important}Concussive Stomp{/c}, you Dodge their next {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} |4attack:attacks;.
{c_important}Concussive Stomp{/c} gains an additional Charge and does {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} enemies and Bosses.
